feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 25 at 12:39PM AKST until November 26 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Winter Weather Advisories for Snow Accumulation Remain in Place for Portions of the Northern Alaska Panhandle... .A gale force low over the northeastern Gulf of Alaska continues to push a front in across the Southeast Alaska Panhandle today. This front will bring periods of heavier snowfall to several locations, including Yakutat, Gustavus, Haines, Skagway and Juneau
entry.cap:areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway

entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches is expected. entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued November 25 at 9:40AM PST by NWS
entry.summary: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT: MANDATORY WOOD BURNING CURTAILMENT IN EFFECT... The declaration of a Mandatory curtailment, when forecast indicate elevated levels of fine particulate air pollution in the region, is
entry.cap:areaDesc: Imperial Valley

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 25 at 8:54PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...AREAS OF FOG WILL REMAIN ALONG THE COAST FROM ST AUGUSTINE NORTHWARD TO ST SIMONS ISLAND THROUGH LATE THIS EVENING... Areas of fog over the near shore waters will continue to move onshore along the Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia coasts. The fog will remain primarily between the coast and I-95 through midnight and possibly expand further inland. Areas most affected
entry.cap:areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns

entry.title: Flood Warning issued November 25 at 7:46PM EST until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Lake and Volusia Counties. .The Saint Johns River at Astor is forecast to continue a slow fall while remaining within Moderate Flood stage into early next week. Residents and interests along the river should expect continuing Moderate flood impacts.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Lake; Volusia

entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Residents and interests along the river should expect continuing Minor flood impacts.
